attributes.action: Make Global Warming more important the CoronaVirus (Covid19)
attributes.additional_details: Every time you put on the TV or Radio on or go online all you seem to hear, see and read is about the CoronaVirus (Covid19). The CoronaVirus (Covid19) is in fact far less lethal the Winter Flu itself. Only around 10 per cent of people who catch the CoronaVirus (Covid19) usually actually die from it as well. In the mean time people's houses are flooding and the cars are getting ruined also because of Global Warming (The Polar Ice Cap melting) causing the sea and river levels to rise high.
attributes.background: To make Global Warming a more important issue and a more important subject and talked about issue on the news, press, TV, radio and online than the CoronaVirus (Covid19)

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the content of the media. 

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:
 
NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
 
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
